FormTable 表格查询

Table 表格 ​

基础用法
组件的基础用法
No Data
Total 0
  • 1 
<template>
  <as-table
    :columns="columns"
    ref="baseTableRef"
    :api="api"
  />
</template>

<script lang="ts">
import { defineComponent, ref, onMounted, nextTick } from "vue";

export default defineComponent({
  setup() {

    onMounted(() => {
      triggerRefresh();
    });

    const api = {
      url: "table",
      method: "get",
      config: {
        baseURL: "http://localhost:7002/",
        withCredentials: false,
      },
    };

    const baseTableRef: any = ref(null);

    const columns = [
      {
        prop: "time",
        label: "时间",
      },
      {
        prop: "province",
        label: "省份",
      },
    ];

    const triggerRefresh = async ({
      extraParams = {},
      resetPage = false,
    } = {}) => {
      const { refreshTable } = baseTableRef.value || {};
      refreshTable && refreshTable({ extraParams, resetPage });
    };


    return {
      columns,
      api,
      baseTableRef,
    };
  },
});
</script>

<style>

</style>
表格属性配置
更多内置属性请参照element-plus
No Data
Total 0
  • 1 
<template>
  <as-table
    :columns="columns"
    ref="baseTableRef"
    :api="api"
    :tableAttrs="{
      headerCellStyle: () => {
        return { background: 'rgb(119, 122, 126)' };
      },
      height: '180px'
    }"
  />
</template>

<script lang="ts">
import { defineComponent, ref, onMounted, nextTick } from "vue";

export default defineComponent({
  setup() {
    onMounted(() => {
      triggerRefresh();
    });

    const api = {
      url: "table",
      method: "get",
      config: {
        baseURL: "http://localhost:7002/",
        withCredentials: false,
      },
    };

    const baseTableRef: any = ref(null);

    const columns = [
      {
        prop: "time",
        label: "时间",
      },
      {
        prop: "province",
        label: "省份",
      },
    ];

    const triggerRefresh = async ({
      extraParams = {},
      resetPage = false,
    } = {}) => {
      const { refreshTable } = baseTableRef.value || {};
      refreshTable && refreshTable({ extraParams, resetPage });
    };

    return {
      columns,
      api,
      baseTableRef,
    };
  },
});
</script>

<style>
</style>
不显示页码
单页表格可以配置初始值
<template>
  <as-table
    :columns="columns"
    :showPagination="false"
    :initData="[
      {
        time: '2024-10-23',
        province: '福建省',
      },
    ]"
  />
</template>

<script lang="ts">
import { defineComponent, ref } from "vue";

export default defineComponent({
  setup() {
    const columns = [
      {
        prop: "time",
        label: "时间",
      },
      {
        prop: "province",
        label: "省份",
      },
    ];

    return {
      columns,
    };
  },
});
</script>

<style>
</style>

Table API ​

Table Attributes ​

属性名说明类型默认值
columns列array[]
api请求配置信息object
tableAttrs表格配置项object
initData表格数据初始值array[]
getTableParams请求表格时带上的参数function
updateTableId默认不会刷新表格的 key 值，开启后，每次请求都会更新 keybooleanfalse
showPagination是否显示页码booleanfalse
Pager
Previous pageForm 表单
Next pageFormTable 表格查询
